title: YungSweetRo throws major shade at love rival Kylie Jenner questioning why fans worship her
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

YungSweetRo, the woman Travis Scott is accused on cheating on Kylie Jenner with, has hit out at Kylie on Instagram .

The model, whose real name is Rojean Kar, posted a series of Instagram stories warning Kylie's fans to consider why they are supporting her, and if she deserves it.

She spoke out against the abuse she was receiving on behalf of makeup mogul Kylie from her followers.

(Image: yungsweetro/Instagram)

(Image: yungsweetro/Instagram)

The first post read: "No shade at all just makes me sad to see such beautiful young women care enough to say such ugly things in defence of someone they don't even know".

The next one said: "If you're going to give anyone your time, attention, energy and admiration, make sure they've really truly earned it".

She urged the Keeping Up With The Kardashian star's followers to love themselves so that they did not focus on negative things about

other people.

(Image: yungsweetro/Instagram)

(Image: yungsweetro/Instagram)

"Don't pay attention to anything that provokes dark, dirty energy to pour out of you", she implored.

"Love yourself so much that you don't have time for anything unless it's making you happy or helping you achieve your goals."

She concluded: "I wish everyone was raising their teenage daughters to know better than to worship people like that."

(Image: Instagram)

The thinly veiled digs come as Rojean has been accused of splitting up Kylie and her boyfriend Travis Scott, who is father to their baby Stormi.

The claims came from social media, with one user photos with several hidden clues that Travis had been dating Rojean while he was still with Kylie.

They wrote: "Travis has been with his side chick for years. Meanwhile yall were screaming 'goals' at him and Kylie."

(Image: Instagram)

Travis and Rojean both posted photos from a ski trip at around the same time, and shortly after at a casino at the same time.

Fans also claimed that a pair of blue trainers in the background of one of Rojean's photos belonged to Travis, who was reportedly pictured in them afterwards.

And in March, Rojean posted a screenshot that showed Kylie had blocked her on Instagram, and not for the first time.

(Image: WireImage)

She wrote: How many times a day do you block and unblock me girl."

Both Rojean and Travis have denied the claims they were in a relationship while he was with Kylie.

In an impassioned post, Rojean begged her 105K fans to leave Kylie alone.

(Image: DPA/PA Images)

The dark-haired beauty claimed the scandal was wreaking havoc with "real lives" as she pleaded with fans to be kind in the wake of the cheating rumours.

She wrote: "None of these rumors are true. It's just the internet creating a false narrative.

"Please stop spreading lies and leave him, her & I alone because it's affecting our real lives. Thank you."

Meanwhile, Travis wrote: "It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true.

“Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real."
description: The model, who has been accused of coming between Kylie and Travis, implored Kylie's fans to stop worshipping her
